episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0200_:
And why would you come to a lonely odd
place like this?
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0300_: It looks like something’s bothering you.
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0500_: I see. In that case, let’s make a little bet.
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0700_:
Here’s how it’ll work: I’ll take the three of you to
a certain location.
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0800_:
If that takes care of what’s bothering you, then
I win the bet.
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_0900_: And if it doesn’t, then you win.
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_1000_:
No pressure or anything. It’s up to you whether
you take the bet or not. So whaddya say?
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_1100_:
How could you even make that bet without
knowing what’s bothering us?
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_1200_: Well that’d be too easy, wouldn’t it?
episode_event_mypace2022/4001_1001_1300_: So, will you take the bet?
episode_event_mypace2022/4002_1001_0100_: Hey, look! Some new Trainers have come!
episode_event_mypace2022/4002_1001_0200_: Haha! It’s just like Grimsley said!
episode_event_mypace2022/4002_1001_0400_:
Sorry to keep you waiting, everyone! I got lost on
my way here!
episode_event_mypace2022/4002_1001_0600_: Leon...did you just come out of the ocean?
episode_event_mypace2022/4002_1001_0800_: All right! Now it’s time for a battle! Here we go!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0100_: We’re hopeless. We never stood a chance...
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0200_:
Aaaahhh! I knew it. There’s no way we can ever
be strong Trainers like all of you.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0300_: Wow. You’re just a ray of sunshine, eh?
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0500_:
Instead of trying to be like someone else, you
should try to be someone only YOU can be.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0600_: I think you’d have a lot more fun if you did!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0700_:
That’s right. It’s important to learn the differences
between yourself and others...
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_0800_: and sometimes this means you may get hurt...
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1000_: I can see things that other people can’t see.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1100_:
I’m different...and sometimes that means people
are afraid of me.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1200_:
But thanks to who I am, I get along great with
ghost Pokémon. I’m really glad that I’m different!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1300_:
My little bro always used to say, “I want to be
just like you, Lee!”
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1400_:
But the two of us are really different people. After
lots of frustration, he finally found his own path.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1500_: That’s why he’s doing so brilliantly now.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1600_: There’s nothing at all wrong with being different!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1700_: I have two younger twin sisters.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1800_:
Even though they like the same Pokémon, there are
still some differences.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_1900_:
But knowing what makes you or others different
can be a lot of fun!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2000_:
Even when people seem to be alike, everyone’s
always got something unique about them.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2100_:
Just like no two clouds in the sky are exactly
the same.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2300_:
I hope the sun is shining tomorrow... That would
be reason enough to smile.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2400_:
If trying to live elegantly is too exhausting, why
not try being more carefree?
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2600_: It looks like Grimsley won the bet.
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_2800_:
I’m gonna keep trying—together with
my Pokémon!
episode_event_mypace2022/4003_1001_3000_:
Just keep meeting lots of different people and
Pokémon, and I know you’ll have a blast!
